wikitext.*:
{{book |title=Ancrene Wisse:
The English Text of the Ancrene Riwle | image = Ancrene Wisse 1962.jpg |editor=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], N.R. Ker |publisher=Oxford University Press |date=[[7 December]] [[1962]] |format=Hardcover, paperback |pages=244 |isbn= |series=Early English Text Society, Original Series }} '''''Ancrene Wisse: The English Text of the Ancrene Riwle''''' is an edition of the 13th-century religious text ''[[wikipedia:Ancrene Wisse|Ancrene Wisse]]'', edited by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It was published in [[1962]] by the Oxford University Press, commissioned by the Early English Text Society. ''Ancrene Wisse'' (or ''Ancrene Riwle'') is early [[Middle English]] for "Guide for Anchoresses", it is a set of rules written for the female religious recluses. There are several surviving manuscripts of this text, this volume is edited from one known as "MS CCCC 402",MS. Corpus Christi College Cambridge 402 which especially interested Tolkien. The book includes a prefatory note by Tolkien, and an introduction by N.R. Ker. ==Publication history and gallery== File:Ancrene Wisse 1962.jpg|1962 hardcover File:Ancrene Wisse 2000.jpeg|2000 hardcover File:Ancrene Wisse 2013.jpeg|2013 paperback * Oxford University Press, hardcover ([[1962]]), pp. 244. * Boydell & Brewer, jacketless hardcover ([[2000]]), ISBN 0197222498 * Oxford University Press, paperback ([[2013]]), ISBN 1843843447 ==External links== * [https://global.oup.com/academic/product/ancrene-wisse-9781843843443?lang=en&cc=cz Order the book] on OUP.com * [https://archive.org/details/ancrene-wisse ''Ancrene Wisse''] on Archive.org {{notes}} {{title|italics}} {{Publishedmajorbooks}} [[Category:Books by J.R.R. Tolkien]] [[Category:Publications by title]] [[Category:Religious books]] [[Category:Scholarly books]] [[de:Ancrene Wisse: The English Text of the Ancrene Riwle]]
